meta.name: Low Stock & Sold Out Watcher for Shopify

parameters.content:
### Webhook Node (Shopify Listener)
Setup Requirement: First, add the "Inventory Level Update" event in Shopify

Purpose: Listens for inventory updates from Shopify

Setup: Configured in Shopify settings; linked to n8n URL

Action: Triggers workflow on inventory level changes

Note: Ensure correct URL setup in Shopify for accurate triggers

### Function Node (Inventory Check)

Purpose: Processes inventory data from Shopify.
Action: Extracts available inventory and item ID

Logic: Determines if inventory is low (<4 items) or out of stock (0 items)

Note: Adjust thresholds as needed for different stock levels
Checks if low_inventory is true (almost out of stock)
Checks if out_of_stock is true (no stock left)

### Shopify graphql

Retrieves product variant, title, inventory quantity, and image.
Uses Shopify's GraphQL API for detailed data retrieval.

Endpoint to be customized: Replace store.myshopify.com in https://store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2023-10/graphql.json with your actual Shopify store's myshopify URL.

Discord1: Configured to send messages to Channel A

Discord2: Configured to send messages to Channel B.

## Low Stock & Sold Out Watcher for Shopify
This n8n workflow automates the process of monitoring inventory levels for Shopify products, ensuring timely updates and efficient stock management. 

It is designed to alert users when inventory levels are low or out of stock, integrating with Shopify's webhook system and providing notifications through Discord (can be changed to any messaging platform) with product images and details.
